metadata.title: CVE-2024-56563 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ceph: fix cred leak in ceph_mds_check_access()get_current_cred() increments the reference counter, but theput_cred() call was missing.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
